product.name: Bevel 2-in-1 Face & Beard Wash
product.description_html: Fresh Skin. Fresh beard. The Bevel Face & Beard Wash is a 2-in-1 formula that cleanses, hydrates, and brightens—keeping skin and facial hair looking their best. Why You’ll Love It: Deep Cleanse + Hydration: Tea tree oil, witch hazel, and aloe vera refresh skin without stripping moisture. Brightens + Evens Tone: Vitamin B3 helps fade dark spots for a smoother, more radiant look. Fights Breakouts: Tea tree oil and witch hazel combat acne and help prevent future blemishes. Gentle Formula: Removes dirt, oil, and impurities without irritation. All-Skin Friendly: Effective for dry, oily, and sensitive skin types.
